name: S.T.A.G.
overview: A strategy space trading game where the object is to reach the highest status possible. In order to achieve this goal, the capable spaceship Zynaar is at your disposal. It can attain a speed of space-miles per hour and has a loading capacity of 10 megatons. your spaceship is linked to the communications systems CTS 3X, which allows you to do business with the dealers on the individual planets directly from your spaceship. Buy, sell, keep your equipment sound and your ship fueled and supplies and a save money for a LASER to defend against pirate attack.
